DOC.brief_title: Compliance With Dietary Recommendations Children Risk Undernutrition
DOC.detailed_description: This study ass compliance dietary recommendation , conjunction oral nutritional supplement meet nutritional requirement child older 36 ( > 36 ) less equal 48 ( â‰¤48 ) month age , effect compliance promote catch-up growth normal healthy growth child risk under-nutrition .
DOC.criteria: Child 36 48 month age . Child weightforheight great equal 5th less equal 25th percentile . Child capable oral feeding . Child 's parent ( ) Legal Guardian willing abstain give additional nonstudy nutritional supplement child throughout study period . Child whose either parent BMI great equal 27.5 kg/m2 . Child allergic intolerant ingredient find study product . Child deliver preterm . Child born small gestational Child birth weight < 2500 g > 4000 g. Child current acute chronic infection . Child demonstrate presence severe gastrointestinal disorder . Child diagnosis neoplastic disease , renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease . Child diagnosis hormonal metabolic disorder . Child congenital disease genetic disorder . Child diagnose infantile anorexia nervosa . Child developmental disability physical disorder . Child disorder hemoglobin structure , function synthesis . Child participate another study approve concomitant study .
